Description:
Ready to Move in
Freshly refurbished this corner home on a subdivided block is perfect for first homebuyers, down-sizers or astute investors. Modernised to suit today's relaxed care-free lifestyle, it's ready to be enjoyed providing spacious open lounge, dining area & updated timber kitchen with 900mm s/s freestanding stove, master bedroom with WIR & new ensuite, 2nd bedroom near the updated bathroom & powder room off the laundry. With roof restored, new guttering, R/C air-conditioner, its own front garden & private rear courtyard with side-street access & close proximity to shops, schools, transport and parks, it's ready for you to move in.

Description:
Outstanding Renovation Or Development Opportunity
Seize the opportunity with this exceptionally deep and versatile allotment representing an outstanding prospect to investors, renovators and developers, brilliant as either a first home, lucrative investment or sensational site to demolish and rebuild multiple townhouses (STCA).
Impeccably maintained, today's floorplan provides good size family room that captures an abundance of light, accompanied by a separate Kitchen/meals. Three bedrooms, study and family bathroom are complemented by a charming enclosed alfresco ideal for all-year-round entertaining.
Outside, a carport and lock-up garage/workshop and deep garden dimensions enhance this great first family home enviably located walking distance to schools, Westall train station and shops. Land size 873m approx.

Description:
A Young Family's Fancy
A quiet boutique court and secure backyard where kids can play safely and a warm inviting home lovingly maintained for 28 years, is certain to lure young families to this immaculate gem. They'll find a spacious lounge room to put their feet up and relax, leading to the updated kitchen with meals area with manicured front garden outlook, three good sized bedrooms with built in robes, supported by the spotless family bathroom & separate toilet plus a covered outdoor area that's ideal for warm weather barbequing. The home also includes ducted heating, air-conditioner, 2 water tanks and remote control tandem garage. Families will love the location to with buses metres away to Clayton shopping strip, cafes, train station and other popular venues and close proximity to schools.

Land! Land! Land!
With approximately 1000sqm of land this wonderful three bedroom home appealing to both the home buyer, investor and the developer is located within walking distance to Clayton Train Station, Clayton Community Centre, park lands and Clayton Central Shopping District.
The choices are endless with fantastic dual occupancy potential to develop at the rear or multi-unit development site (S.T.C.A.) this existing home comprises 3 large bedrooms, central bathroom with separate toilet, kitchen with gas appliances and meals area, open plan living and an expansive out door entertaining area.

If you are looking for a great property to move in or to add to your investment portfolio - look no further! Choice of unit 1 or unit 10 - both front townhouses.
These nearly new townhouses with its great style, impressive appeal and great rental return (unit 10) will surely satisfy your requirements.

There are three good size bedrooms with BIR upstairs (master bedroom with ensuite), powder room downstairs and large double lock-up garage.

If you are looking for your first home or secure investment - look no further! Comprising open plan living with direct access through sliding door to a sizeable outdoor entertaining area, kitchen with the best quality stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and Caesar stone bench tops.

Description:
Relax... it's all done so you can have fun!
Move in, relax and never do school drop-off again! Overlooking the playing-fields of Clayton South Primary School, this three bedroom brick home has been perfectly polished - so there's nothing to do but relax and let the kids play!
Newly painted and freshly carpeted, this quality home features a classic cream kitchen, an elegant mosaic detailed bathroom and a separate WC. Gas heated with an air-conditioner and fans for every room, there are robes for every bedroom and a secure garage to the side.
Best of all, there's even more living in a bonus al fresco room - perfect for entertaining or as the kids' wet weather playspace. Close to the Clayton shopping strip and station with the bus at the end of the street, this is the family living with polish and a playful position.

Description:
Entry Level Opportunity!!
A fantastic opportunity arises for first home buyers wanting a great valued property with plenty of space, or an astute investor wanting rock solid returns (approx. $1400 p/m). Developers! Great opportunity to develop on approx. 650 m2 (STCA)
Come and take a look at this home featuring, lounge/dining room, kitchen/meals area, 3 bedrooms, separate toilet, double garage and spacious yard.
Close to Clayton & Westall Train Stations (Cranbourne, Pakenham & City Loop lines), Clayton South Child Care Centre.
Don't hesitate - this is a good buy either to live in or as investment property!

Description:
Family Comfort & Practicality
Places for parents, space for kids and room for everyone to come together ...This home delivers immediate comfort with scope to add your own personal touch at your leisure, ideally positioned in a safe family-friendly court, close to shops, schools, transport, parks, Monash Medical Centre and University. The practical single level layout is designed to offer clearly defined open plan living/dining with central kitchen (freestanding 900mm stainless steel cooker) and rumpus/teenage retreat, 3 robed bedrooms, family-sized extensively paved garden providing excellent space for summertime barbeques and secure play area for kids. With 2 R/C air-conditioners, garden shed, double carport and great neighbours, it's a great place to raise a family.
Anna Mastrogiannis : 0416 235 329

Location, Quality, Priced to Sell!
On offer is a beautiful triple frontage red brick home located in one of the most convenient pocket of Clayton South, set in a quiet and leafy cul de sac yet only minutes away from Westall train station and Springvale shopping central.
Featuring:
Roller Shutter all around,
3 Large bedrooms with BIR
Master bedroom with Semi ensuite
Spacious lounge
Ducted Heating
Quality timber kitchen with granite bench top
Separate meals area
And so much more..
Terms: 10% deposit, Balance 30/60/90 days
